claims.claim: Transgender people are trying to force others to accept their gender identity.

claims.claim: Transgender people are just going through a phase and will eventually revert to their assigned gender.

claims.claim: Transgender people are just confused and need psychological help to return to their assigned gender.
claims.fact: Being transgender is not a mental illness or a disorder. claims.fact: Using someone's preferred pronouns is a basic form of respect and is not an infringement on free speech.
